item.description:

item.title: Talk: The Capacities of Interaction
item.dc:creator: Alex Taylor
item.description:
The @cityuni_hcid seminar series has been rebooted, with seminars now being held on the last Thursday of the month via Zoom. This month @alxndrt will talk about designing assistive technologies in ‘The Capacities of Interaction’. Sign up here: https://t.co/UH28xXjnMh #design #HCI pic.twitter.com/JBn0YEkaIZ — Interaction Lab (@cinteractionlab) November 18, 2020 [...]

Read More... from Talk: The Capacities of Interaction

The post Talk: The Capacities of Interaction appeared first on Alex Taylor.
item.content:encoded:
The @cityuni_hcid seminar series has been rebooted, with seminars now being held on the last Thursday of the month via Zoom. This month @alxndrt will talk about designing assistive technologies in ‘The Capacities of Interaction’. Sign up here: https://t.co/UH28xXjnMh #design #HCI pic.twitter.com/JBn0YEkaIZ

— Interaction Lab (@cinteractionlab) November 18, 2020
